column4: my gutsy install just failed to boot. can anyone give me a hand?
Try to boot in Safe Graphics mode.
no, it's much worse than that
i can't boot into recovery mode
I am not speaking about Recovery mode. I suggested that you first try the live CD booting in Safe Graphics mode before installing anything.
ok. i am typing this from the live cd. that runs fine in full graphics mode
i can also mount my root partition from the live cd. so i don't understand why it has trouble booting
Ah, yes, I see. I did not encounter such error messages and cannot help you. Sorry.
right, but how do i get hold of the original config file?
I do not know what 'to get hold of sth.' means.
Is your original config file lost?
well, it's in the ubuntu archive. i don't have it on my system. i was wondering if there's a simpler way to obtain it than finding the package and decompressing it
I do not know of a simpler way.
